sentences.en: " You're irrepressible,'she said, " I expected to find you in sackcloth and ashes, and silent. "
sentences.cn: “ 你无可救药, ” 她说, “ 我原指望见到你满面愁容,一心忏悔, 默默无语. ”

sentences.en: An amusement park is the perfect locale for a bunch of irrepressible youngsters to have all sorts of adventures.
sentences.cn: 游乐场是一帮精力过剩的年轻人寻求各种惊险刺激的绝佳场所。
精力充沛的乐观主义者
他流露出压抑不住的喜悦.

sentences.en: I will be in this holiday irrepressible think you!
sentences.cn: 我会在这段假期里无可救药的想你!

sentences.en: It's just the irrepressible, irrational investor belief that one can beat the market.
sentences.cn: 实际上,这只是一种抑制不住的 、 毫无理性的、认为投资者可以打败市场的“信念 ” 在作怪.
杰拉德的兴奋难以抑制。
乔恩朝气蓬勃，精力旺盛。

sentences.en: Marcovaldo the irrepressible dreamer, Marcovaldo the inveterate schemer.
sentences.cn: 天生的梦想家马可瓦多, 智多星马可瓦多.

sentences.en: Some former colleagues wonder whether the irrepressible dealmaker will have enough to do.
sentences.cn: 他以前的一些同事怀疑,这位闲不住的交易高手是否会有足够的事可做.

sentences.en: The era of cheap Chinese consumer goods may finally be ending, thanks to irrepressible inflation.
sentences.cn: 因为不可压抑的通货膨胀,也许廉价中国消费品的时代快结束了.

sentences.en: The old neighbourhoods are almost intact, and the city's irrepressible people have mostly returned.
sentences.cn: 街坊邻居之间的感情并未受到影响, 在城里按耐不住的人们也大部分回到了家.

sentences.en: Well aware of its inadequacy an irrepressible desire to catch up with the world.
sentences.cn: 他们看到了自己的不足而决心迎头赶上,这股力量是势不可当的.

sentences.en: Yes, an irrepressible emotions so deep into our hearts!
sentences.cn: 是的, 一份抑制不住的情感就这样走进我们的心灵深处!

sentences.en: You cannot keep her quiet for long ; she's irrepressible!
sentences.cn: 想让她多安静会儿可办不到, 她总是欢蹦乱跳的!

trans.tran_en: An irrepressible person is lively and energetic and never seems to be depressed
